entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 12.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 8

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
